title: Statistical Estimation of Stochastic Context-Free Grammars Using the Inside-Outside Algorithm and a Transformation on Grammars
venue: International Conference on Graphics and Interaction

tldr.text: A combination of a transformation algorithm between some Stochastic Context-Free Grammars and the Inside-Outside algorithm allows us to define a method for the estimation of the rule probabilities of Stochastics with the same time complexity as the inside-outside algorithm.

references.title: Hidden Markov estimation for unrestricted stochastic context-free grammars
The Inside/Outside Algorithm: Grammatical Inference Applied to Stochastic Context-Free Grammars
Growth transformations for functions on manifolds.
Basic Methods of Probabilistic Context Free Grammars
Applications of stochastic context-free grammars using the Inside-Outside algorithm
The Theory of Parsing, Translation, and Compiling
An inequality and associated maximization technique in statistical estimation of probabilistic functions of a Markov process
